rows.label: qst700902_msg0001
rows.name: Footprints. I wonder how far they go.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0101
rows.name:
Footprints... which means
it's probably not a ghost.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0201
rows.name:
Footprints. I wonder
where they are heading.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0301
rows.name:
As I thought, these are not human
footprints. ...We should be careful.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0401
rows.name:
Ah, footprints! They seem
to continue onward.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0501
rows.name:
See, there are no ghosts.
Let's follow them.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0601
rows.name:
Monster footprints. I'm not
keen on it, but it looks
like we're playing tag.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0701
rows.name:
As I expected. If we follow
these footprints, we should be
able to identify our opponent.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0801
rows.name:
There are traces of it being
trampled many times. Let's
go a little further.
